text:
[Verse]
Under the moonlight glow
Whispers in the night show
Footsteps in the sand slow
Holding hands as we go

[Verse 2]
Stars above so bright
Dancing in the twilight
Hearts beating just right
Lost in the soft light

[Chorus]
La la la let's go
Feel the night flow
Moonlit dreams we sow
In this gentle glow

[Verse 3]
Shoes off on the shore
Waves crashing more and more
Laughter we can't ignore
Moments we both adore

[Bridge]
The night is ours to keep
Promises run deep
Stars we love to reap
In dreams not just in sleep

[Chorus]
La la la let's go
Feel the night flow
Moonlit dreams we sow
In this gentle glow
title: Moonlit Walk
